mapper.sql: id, dispatch_type, version, model_user_type, model_user_obj_id, create_time,create_person
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into cfg_dispatch_detail_model
id,
dispatch_type,
version,
model_user_type,
model_user_obj_id,
create_time,
create_person,
company_id,

mapper.update:
update cfg_dispatch_detail_model
dispatch_type = #{dispatchType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
model_user_type = #{modelUserType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model_user_obj_id = #{modelUserObjId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_person = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cfg_dispatch_detail_model set dispatch_type = #{dispatchType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, model_user_type = #{modelUserType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_user_obj_id = #{modelUserObjId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT model.id, model.dispatch_type dispatchType, model.version, model.model_user_type modelUserType, model.model_user_obj_id modelUserObjId, model.create_time createTime, model.create_person createPerson, sys.username createPersonName FROM ( SELECT * FROM cfg_dispatch_detail_model WHERE id =(SELECT MAX(id) FROM cfg_dispatch_detail_model WHERE dispatch_type = #{dispatchType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) )AS model LEFT JOIN sys_company_users sys on sys.id = model.create_person
ORDER BY model.version DESC

SELECT model.id, model.dispatch_type dispatchType, model.version, model.model_user_type modelUserType, model.model_user_obj_id modelUserObjId, model.create_time createTime, model.create_person createPerson, sys.username createPersonName FROM(SELECT * FROM cfg_dispatch_detail_model WHERE dispatch_type = #{dispatchType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )AS model LEFT JOIN sys_company_users sys on sys.id = model.create_person ORDER BY model.version DESC
